name: Tablet mode & collapsed nav panel
description:
Features:
- Collapses the sidebar to 20px and open's on hover with a delayed close
- At 1000px page width, the layout changes to a Parent/Detail Layout when in List view to allow better viewing at smaller screen sizes.
additional_info:
Change Log:
June 29th, 2016: Birth
- Added collapsed navigation panel
- Added tablet layout for List View: tightens up padding and stacks the List Panel on top of the Task Panel.
